page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: This is predominantly an{AGRICULTURAL} area. It is known locally as{TEALING} but settlement is scattered consisting of farms and two small nucleations -{ {KIRKTON OF TEALING}and {INVERALDIE.} The oldest settlement is Kirkton of Tealing and the church is of some historical interest. The houses at Inveraldie date from post-war times when the RAF abandonned the airfield near here. There is only one industry of note - the{VEGETABLE PROCESSING} plant at Inveraldie. A major new development currently being carried out is the improvement of the{A929 {ROAD}from Dundee to Forfar and Aberdeen. People living in the area are either employed in farming or commute to work in{DUNDEE}which is only about 6km. to the south.
